name: Harry Walter
description: OK, I am not superman and am not perfect, but I am a really nice guy with a big and kind heart, a romantic and looking for one nice, kind, funny, smart woman to share a real romance with. I am the type of guy who wants to sweep a woman off her feet and share something really special, like a fairytale, a fairytale romance, and yes I do believe in a fairytale romance, just have to find the right person to share it with. I am 6.6 tall, muscular build and in good shape, educated and work as an artist,i draw ,paint and i make art craft and sculpture, love so many things in this world! I love to read and to write, love travel, movies, music, children, animals, charities and I really love any charities that help children and animals, love smiles and laughter, comedy, history and learning about the past, and much more, oh and I am a romantic and love to kiss and cuddle, and am certified in massage to and give a mean neck and shoulder rub! 🙂
